item.title: tryhackme: game zone
item.description: this is a walkthrough for the room “game zone” on tryhackme. this was the 4th room in the “advanced exploitation” chapter, part of the “offensive pentesting” path. i liked this room because i like sql (yes, i know). database security is a very important component of cybersecurity, as databases are used in almost every type of modern organization. at the end of the walkthrough, i’ll also include a link to a resource about preventing database attacks.
